products.product_name: Red Cotton Casual Shirt for Men
products.description: Premium red cotton shirt with button-down collar, full sleeves, perfect for casual wear. Soft breathable fabric with regular fit.
Solid maroon casual shirt for men with spread collar and patch pocket. Comfortable cotton blend fabric ideal for everyday wear.
Classic blue denim shirt with long sleeves, button closure, and two chest pockets. Versatile casual wear for all seasons.
Crisp white formal shirt with slim fit design, perfect for office and formal occasions. Premium cotton fabric with wrinkle-free finish.
Stylish red and white checked casual shirt with button-down collar. Soft cotton material with comfortable regular fit for casual outings.
Basic solid black cotton crew neck t-shirt. Regular fit with short sleeves, ideal for casual everyday wear. Premium quality fabric.
Casual red polo t-shirt with collar and button placket. Made from soft cotton blend, perfect for smart casual looks.
Premium navy blue linen shirt with full sleeves and button closure. Lightweight and breathable, perfect for summer.
Trendy red shirt with abstract print design. Comfortable cotton fabric with spread collar and full sleeves.
Casual red henley t-shirt with button placket and short sleeves. Soft cotton fabric perfect for relaxed everyday style.
